pullrequest.title: Task 1: Update satellite colors and wheel directions

content.raw:
I tried this out locally, and the colors seem better to me.

It looks like this PR also moves around the rocks and crates in the world as well.  Is that intended?  I'm going to approve this PR since it is fine for me either way, I just thought I would point out that this is more than just the colors and wheel directions.
content.html:
I tried this out locally, and the colors seem better to me.

It looks like this PR also moves around the rocks and crates in the world as well. Is that intended? I'm going to approve this PR since it is fine for me either way, I just thought I would point out that this is more than just the colors and wheel directions.
